#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
void calc()
{
    long long n,i,a=1;
    string data="9";
    cin>>n;
    if(n%2!=0)
        cout<<"0\n";
    else
    {
        for(i=4;i<=n;i+=2) data+="0";
        cout<<data<<"\n";
    }
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        calc();
}
